author: Anthony Spadafora
title: Travelex forked out multi-million ransom to restore its systems
description: A new report has revealed that Travelex may have paid $2.3m to cybercriminals to decrypt its systems after suffering a ransomware attack earlier this year.
content:
After suffering a ransomware attack earlier this year, Travelex reportedly paid a $2.3m ransom payment to get its systems back online after they were encrypted.
Back in January of this year, hackers deployed the Sodinokibi ransomware throughout the foreign e… [+1604 chars]
